version_description:
* NEW: Themes!
* NEW: Chinese and German translations added
* NEW: Allow special characters from other languages in note filenames.
* NEW: Preferences menus visually improved
* NEW: 'Cancelled' title is also added in Archive Processed Tasks re

- Compatibility fix for iOS 12
- Korean translation added

New version coming up! Email us at hello@noteplan.co to join the Beta.

NEW: Overdue-List to show which tasks are still open in the past.

Fixed:
- Crash in processing the markdown.
- The number only tags were not working.
- Numbers were formatted orange in the events.
- Purchase info was not closing on iPa

- NEW: Scheduling a parent todo will schedule the children todos (indented below the main todo) automatically too.
- FIXED: When NotePlan was restored from the background after not using it for a while, the current day will be opened.
- FIXED: Sched

Various bugfixes:
- Random crashes fixed
- Agenda was sometimes not loaded
- 12/24h format issues fixed
- Schedule button was disabled for todos with specific markdown settings
- Onboarding optimised

- New: Planned to make a call? Write the phone number directly into the todo, NotePlan can detect it now and makes it tappable!
- Fixed: Dated todos below the events were kept indented, even though the master todo was not present (now its always non in

Thanks so much for all the feedback and for your support!
We have more bug fixes for you! And something in Beta: Dropbox Sync! (But be careful, its still work-in-progress)

Follow us on Twitter to get all the news or to say hi: @NotePlanApp
